meanings.sent1: The castle was walled, protecting the royal family inside.
meanings.sent2: The walled garden was a peaceful retreat from the bustling city.
meanings.sent3: The walled playground kept the children safe and sound during playtime.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt walled off, guarded against any more hurt.
meanings.sent5: The walled fortress stood strong against any enemy attacks.

meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins were walled structures, showing the architectural skills of the past.
meanings.sent2: The walled room provided privacy for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The walled house kept the family warm and cozy during the winter.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt walled in, unable to think clearly under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The walled city was a maze of narrow streets and hidden alleys.

meanings.sent1: The walled building was a symbol of strength and durability.
meanings.sent2: The walled structure withstood the test of time.
meanings.sent3: The walled fort was a formidable sight on the hill.
meanings.sent4: The walled house was a cozy retreat from the storm outside.
meanings.sent5: The walled enclosure housed exotic plants from around the world.
